name: Froggair
description:
This game is now also multiplayer, and in a prototype here:
https://froggair.herokuapp.com/

W to move forward.

A/D to turn. 

Space or E or L to lick.

Catch as many flies as you can and grow big and strong. 

M to mute and P to unmute the music.

If you play a full round of timed mode, please comment which frog, and the score it says you got!
